title: Process Perfected with Tayte Proulx-Royds
content:
For Tayte Proulx-Royds, the off-season is all about staying sharp and having fun—and the Kona Process 134 is her ultimate tool for both. This video takes you into the world of Tayte, where XC precision meets enduro toughness. From tight, flowy climbing trails to technical, rough descents, Tayte weilds the Process 134 and proves it’s as versatile as the athletes who ride it…

The post Process Perfected with Tayte Proulx-Royds appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
